title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Science Learning Strategies Using Hypervideo Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-Level Knowledge in Science and Basic Proficiency in Digital Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Develop the ability to analyze scientific concepts by distinguishing between shared and personal annotations on a hypervideo platform

Learners will analyze their hypervideo usage patterns (playback speed, repeated segments, interaction frequency) using a mixed-methods research design (quantitative + qualitative) and write a 10-page report proposing three or more improvement strategies.
Deepen scientific domain knowledge through instructor-provided feedback and interactions with peer learners
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
